sentences.sContent: The shortage of teachers was blamed on government cutbacks.
sentences.sCn: 教师短缺归咎于政府削减经费。

sentences.sContent: A fall in donations has forced the charity to make cutbacks .
sentences.sCn: 捐款减少迫使慈善机构削减开支。

remMethod.val: 来自词组cut back(减少， 削减)

trans.tranOther: a reduction in something, such as the number of workers in a company or the amount of money a government or company spends
